traits.name: Cargo Hauler
entries: The bosun has advantage on Strength checks.

traits.name: Sea Legs
entries: The bosun has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Light Hammer
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hook
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13).
